GSP33yamis_au:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GSP33yamis_au:7: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvaṃ pravartate |
GSP33yamis_au:8: iti sādhayituṃ pūrvaṃ pūrva-pakṣaṃ pracakṣmahe || YIs_1 ||
GSP33yamis_au:13: tathā hi --- asya pratyakṣam anyad vā sādhakaṃ bhavet ? pratyakṣam api laukikaṃ yaugikaṃ vā
GSP33yamis_au:16: sarvā1rtha-darśana-śakti-śālinam avagamayatā hi deśa-kāla-svabhāva-viprakarṣa-vyavadhāna-juṣaḥ sarva evā7rthās darśanaṃ śaktiś ca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yamis_au:18: laukika-pratyakṣasya niravadhir ayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanā-bhūmir iti katham iva tad iha sādhanam iti manyemahi /
GSP33yamis_au:22: tat khalu yogi-vijñānam aindriyakaṃ na vā ? aindriyakam api bahir-indriya-sambhavam āntara-karaṇa-janitaṃ vā ? bahir-indriyāṇi tāvat
GSP33yamis_au:27: cā7vidyamānair ajātā3dibhiḥ saṃbhavati sannikarṣaḥ; tasya hy āśrayatvād
GSP33yamis_au:31: bhavati ca --- yad yat-sahakāri yat-kārya-jananam, tat tad-abhāve na taj janayati ; yathā kṣiti-salila-sahakāri aṅkura-kārya-janana-bījaṃ
GSP33yamis_au:34: jñāna-jananānī7ti tāny api nā7tīte 'nāgate vā9rthe jñānaṃ janayantī7ti na tad upajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yatho2kta-viṣaya-niyamam atikrāmati /
GSP33yamis_au:36: bāhya-viṣaya-mitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśa-karaṇatā2ṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣur-ādibhiḥ /
GSP33yamis_au:37: ataś ca kaścid andho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yamis_au:41: yady atra yat-tantra-vṛtti na tat tan-nirapekṣaṃ
GSP33yamis_au:47: na khalu suprayukta-bheṣa-ja-śata-vihita-saṃskāram api śrotraṃ rūpa-rasa-vibhāvā1vagamāya kalpate /
GSP33yamis_au:56: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva vidita-viṣaya-niyama-vyatikramaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_au:57: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam iti na viśvā1nubhavā1iśvarya-śālini
GSP33yamis_au:59: tat khalv anumānam āgamo vā ? anumānam api viśeṣato
GSP33yamis_au:60: dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ vā ? tatra sakala-padavī-davīyasi bhavati na tāvat
GSP33yamis_au:65: liṅgaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam api kiñcana labhate /
GSP33yamis_au:69: kāryatvād eva jagatas tat-kartur anumīyatām || YIs_5 ||
GSP33yamis_au:74: na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam, avayava-sanniveśā3dibhir hetubhis tat-siddheḥ /
GSP33yamis_au:76: cā7nyā1vayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ā-dvyaṇukam akhilam avayavi krama-nihīyamāna-nānā2vayava-vyatiṣaṅga-viśeṣa-janitam avagatam ity antata
GSP33yamis_au:79: tad-anuguṇā1dṛṣṭa-viśiṣṭa-tat-tat-kṣetra-jña-saṃyogā1samavāyikāraṇaka iti upakaraṇam api samasta-kṣetra-jña-vartini dharmā1dharma-lakṣaṇāny adṛṣṭāni
GSP33yamis_au:87: puruṣa-dhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyato-dṛṣṭa-liṅgād anumīyate ?
GSP33yamis_au:88: tad idam aviditā1numāna-vṛttasya sva-mati-racita-tarala-tarko1llasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ
GSP33yamis_au:91: kim asya tasminn āyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmā7tha vā sthitiḥ |
GSP33yamis_au:92: pravṛttir vā0dyayos tāvat sādhya-hīnaṃ nidarśanam || YIs_6 ||
GSP33yamis_au:94: ye hi yad-dehā1dhīna-sukha-duḥkho1pabhoga-bhāginaḥ, bhavati hi tad-ucitā1dṛṣṭa-śālināṃ sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ tad-dehina iva
GSP33yamis_au:97: svā1vayava-samavāya-lakṣaṇā sthitir avayavy-atiṣaṅga-viśeṣād ṛte na cetayitāraṃ param apekṣate
GSP33yamis_au:99: sthitiḥ, na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣity-ādau sambhavatī7ti sthitim api nai7ka-rūpāṃ
GSP33yamis_au:107: cetanair bhoktṛbhir bhogyaḥ karmabhir janyate hi naḥ || YIs_7 ||
GSP33yamis_au:108: yuktaṃ cai7tat --- yad-ubhaya-vādi-siddhānām eva cetanānāṃ kartṛtvā1bhyupagamaḥ; lāghavāt
GSP33yamis_au:112: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yat sarva eva ca cetanāḥ || YIs_8 ||
GSP33yamis_au:117: mā bhūt pratyakṣatā tasya śaktimad dhy akṣa-gocaraḥ || YIs_9 ||
GSP33yamis_au:123: tena karmabhir ātmānaḥ sarvaṃ nirmimatāṃ pṛthak || YIs_10 ||
GSP33yamis_au:124: api ca tad eva cetana-karṭrkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate, yad eva śakya-kriyaṃ
GSP33yamis_au:127: katham iva tat-tat-kāryatvam ? kathantarāṃ ca tad-upādāno1pakaraṇā3deḥ
GSP33yamis_au:131: api cā7nīśvareṇa parimita-śakti-jñānena vigrahavatā9navāpta-kāmena kṛtam avagataṃ ghaṭā3di-kāryam iti tathā-vidhaṃ boddhāram upasthāpayan hetur
GSP33yamis_au:134: / pramāṇā1ntara-gocare hi liṅgini liṅga-balād āpatato viparīta-viśeṣāṃs
GSP33yamis_au:136: iha punar atipatita-sakala-mānā1ntara-karma-bhāve sarva-nirmāṇa-nipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvaya-vyatirekā1vadhāritā2vinā-bhāva-bhājo dharmās tān apy
GSP33yamis_au:140: avāpta-kāmatvān na tāvad ātmā1rthe sṛjati; pralaya-samaye
GSP33yamis_au:141: pralīna-sakala-karaṇa-kalevarā3di-bhogo1pakaraṇatayā ca cetanānāṃ duḥkhā1bhāvād duḥkhi-darśana-janita-kṛpā-prayuktir api nā7stī7ti
GSP33yamis_au:146: na co7pādānā3di-sākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛtvam ity api niyamaḥ; upādānam upakaraṇaṃ cā7viduṣa evā8tmano jñānā3diṣu kartṛtvāt /
GSP33yamis_au:150: prayogaś ca bhavati --- mahī-mahīdharā3di kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33yamis_au:158: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojana-rahitatvād aśarīratvād vā muktā3tmavad iti /
GSP33yamis_au:159: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣity-ādau śakya-nihnavam |
GSP33yamis_au:163: na ce8dṛśa eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ, ne7tara ity
GSP33yamis_au:165: yat tu śakya-kriyaṃ śakya-jñāno1pādāno1pakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata iti, tad astu nāma /
GSP33yamis_au:166: kin tu te kriyā-jñāna-śaktī kriyā-jñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye /
GSP33yamis_au:167: te ca kṣity-ādiṣu yatho2kta-sādhana-bala-samupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ
GSP33yamis_au:169: kriyā-gocara iti viṣaya-niyamaḥ kaścit kriyāyā dṛṣṭaḥ; yene7dam
GSP33yamis_au:179: dharmā1dharmābhyām eva phalam, cetanā1nadhiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣām eteṣām acaitanyenā7kiñcitkaratvāt
GSP33yamis_au:182: bījā1ṅkurā3dayas tu pakṣā1ntarbhūtā iti tair vyabhicāra-vacanam
GSP33yamis_au:189: dṛṣṭā1nusāriṇī hi sarvatra kalpanā; na dṛṣṭa-virodhinī /
GSP33yamis_au:198: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ kartur arthā1ntara-viṣayam
GSP33yamis_au:201: api ca kiṃ tad-itara-samasta-vastu-viṣayam ajñānā3di vyāpakam, uta
GSP33yamis_au:204: na khalu kumbha-kāraḥ kumbhā1tireki kim api na vijānāti /
GSP33yamis_au:206: katipaya-viṣayam ? tad api na, aniyata-viṣayatayā tasya tasya vyabhicāra-darśanāt /
GSP33yamis_au:207: na cā7sti kiñcid-vyavasthitam, yad avidyā4dimān eva kartṛtām anubhavati /
GSP33yamis_au:208: na ca śarīriṇai9va kartrā bhāvyam, śarīra-grahaṇenai7vā7naikāntyāt /
GSP33yamis_au:209: na khalu śarīra-viśiṣṭas sann evā7yam ātmā śarīram upādatte, ayogino
GSP33yamis_au:219: prerya-vastu-sambandhinā prerakeṇa bhavitavyam iti; na yato 'nyad apy adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ māna-daṇḍā3di deha-sambandho nāmā7paro nā8dartavyaḥ /
GSP33yamis_au:223: / dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍa-cakrā3diṣu kara-saṃyogā3dinā kulālā3deḥ pravartayitṛtvam ity ucyeta; tad api na; abhidhyāna-mātreṇai7va
GSP33yamis_au:226: para-preraṇā3tmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet; kiṃ śarīraṃ saṅkalpayati, yena
GSP33yamis_au:228: karaṇam iti cen na; manasaḥ karaṇatvāt /
GSP33yamis_au:239: nirmāṇāye7ty aparimita-jñānā1iśvarya-śaktiḥ śarīrā3dy-anapekṣaḥ saṅkalpād eva sakala-bhuvana-nirmāṇa-kṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /
GSP33yamis_au:240: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭā3diṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet;
GSP33yamis_au:241: hutavaha-viśeṣeṇa mahānasā3dau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ? yena
GSP33yamis_au:243: yādṛśo dhūmo yatrā7vagataḥ tatrai7va tādṛśas tat-sampādana-samartho
GSP33yamis_au:245: sidhyatī7ti cet; tad idam asmābhir abhidhīyamānaṃ kim iti na hṛdayam adhirohati bhavatām
GSP33yamis_au:253: api ca vibhu-dravya-saṃyoginaḥ parispandavataś ca sarvatra
GSP33yamis_au:255: jñāna-sukhā3di-nitya-dravya-viśeṣa-guṇā1numitā3tma-saṃyogino manasaḥ katham iva sparśa-rahitatatvam ? kathaṃ ca vāyavīya-dravyasya
GSP33yamis_au:257: tvag-indriye tad-viparyayaḥ ? taijasasya vā rūpa-sparśayor anyattarasya vā prākaṭya-niyame 'pi rūpo1palambha-sādhanatā9numita-taijasa-bhāvasya
GSP33yamis_au:264: aneka-niyama-darśana-vighāta-prasaṅgāc ca tathā9bhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānam anyatrā7bhiniveśāt
GSP33yamis_au:267: ce7ṣṭate, acetanatvāt; yad acetanaṃ tat tathā, yathā tathā-vidhaṃ
